title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘She’s young enough to be his granddaughter’: My dad, 85, is being seduced by his caregiver. What can I do?
items.description: “He is of sound mind, but he might succumb to someone who offers him companionship.”

items.title: Follow the leader. New research finds these politicians are the savviest stock pickers.
items.description: Follow the leader. New research shows one specific group of Congress members are savvy stock pickers.

items.title: Bitcoin’s slumping again. The biggest corporate owner admits it may have to sell if things get worse.
items.description: Bitcoin sprinted higher over the holiday, but that’s now fading and bitcoin’s biggest corporate holder says they’d be forced to sell if things worsen.

items.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
items.description: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits.”

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
